Package com.gotenna.sdk.bluetooth

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GTConnectionManager.GTConnectionListener
    Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the connection state to the goTenna changes.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BluetoothAdapterManager
    A singleton that wraps some helpful functionality for the BluetoothAdapter related to device scanning as well as checking if Bluetooth is enabled on a device or not.
    GTConnectionManager
    A singleton that handles scanning for and connecting to the goTenna.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BluetoothAdapterManager.BluetoothStatus
    Indicates the status of Bluetooth on this Android Device.
    GTConnectionManager.GTConnectionState
    Used to indicate our current connection state to the goTenna.
